text.en: MOC is authorized by CSA B622 Clauses 4, 5, 6?
Is the company in compliance with the filling limits requirements of B622 c. 5.2.4?
Is the hose assembly minimum working pressure 350psi? (B622 c. 5.1(f))
Shell and Head Rejection Criteria (B620 c. 7.2.1.8)
Leaks, Shear Sections and Suitable Guards, Road Clearance (B620 c. 5.2.2.4, 5.2.2.8, 5.2.8)
Emergency Shut-Off Devices and Discharge Controls
Internal Valves (closed), Fusible Devices, Emergency Shut-Off (B620 c. 5.2.2.1.2)
Off-truck Remote Control Shut-Off, Monitoring Feature, Passive Emergency Shutdown System (B620 c. 5.3.2.5; B622 c. 5.2.6)
Daily/Monthly Testing and Report of Emergency Discharge Controls
MOC and hose assemblies pre-loading inspection done by the shipper or carrier (B622 c. 5.2)
Fail-safe brake interlock system or wheel chock (B622 c. 5.1(g))
Equipped with emergency discharge controls (B622 c. 5.2.6, 5.5.1)
Loading and unloading operations under supervision (B622 c. 5.3.1.1, 5.6)
After loading and unloading hatches, valves and other openings are closed & secured (B622 c. 5.4, 5.7)
Are there are any other non-compliances noted with the TC 331 highway tank in relation to CSA B620 or B622 noted during the inspection?
